Footer.caption: At RedNOx, our goal is to develop effective, sustainable, and durable solutions to agricultural challenges. We have developed and/or on a roadmap to demonstrate low-cost, in-field sensors for greenhouse gas emissions from soil in agricultural settings.

HomePage.title: Rednox
HomePage.heroDescription: Cut emissions, reduce compliance costs, and unlock operational savingsâ€”faster than regulatory deadlines

whyYouShouldCare.headline: Why it matters
whyYouShouldCare.subheader: Slash Fuel Costs, Avoid Fines, and Cut Greenhouse Gas Emissions
whyYouShouldCare.description: Eliminating even one ppm of NOâ‚“ today prevents both an air-quality fine and a greenhouse-gas penalty tomorrow. By cutting NOâ‚“ emissions, which drive smog and acid rain, and reducing Nâ‚‚O, which has a global warming potential 298 times that of COâ‚‚, you can slash fuel costs, avoid fines, and cut greenhouse gas emissions.

HeavyDutyEngines.title: Heavy-Duty Engines
HeavyDutyEngines.description: RedNOx offers advanced sensor solutions for Heavy-Duty Engines, designed to meet the rigorous demands of upcoming regulations like the 2027 U.S. EPA & CARB

problemSection.headline: The Problem
problemSection.subheader: OEMs face the 2027 U.S. EPA & CARB 0.02 g/hp-hr NOx limit while customers demand < 1 gallon/h fuel-penalties. Current electrochemical sensors bottom out at ~50 ppm.

1.title: 1 â€“ 20 ppm detection with Â±10 % error
1.description: This keeps you inside warranty margins.

2.title: Plug-and-play ECU interface.
2.description: One harness, two CAN frames per second.

3.title: Heater-optimised ceramic stack
3.description: That reaches temperature in < 30 s â€” meets cold-start FTP.

4.title: Cloud API & dashboard
4.description: Trigger regen or urea-dosing only when needed, saving up to 5 % DEF.

list.1: Sensor bolts into the after-treatment slip joint.
list.2: Data flows via J1939 to the ECU (closed-loop) and via LTE to RedNOx Cloud.
list.3: Fleet manager views per-truck NOx intensity & fuel/NHâ‚ƒ trade-off curves.

Gensets.title: Gensets & Prime Power
Gensets.description: For stationary engines, continuous compliance and operational efficiency are paramount. RedNOx offers advanced sensing solutions for Gensets & Prime Power, designed to provide accurate, real-time NOx emission data. Our sensors help avoid costly shutdowns under Tier 4 Final rules by providing detection within a <10 ppm range. With plug-and-play integration into SCADA panels via Modbus-TCP and remote telemetry for proactive self-diagnostics, RedNOx ensures your operations remain compliant and optimized, even in remote locations.

1.title: < 10 ppm range
1.description: Avoids shutdowns under Tier 4 Final rules.

2.title: Modbus-TCP
2.description: Drops straight into most SCADA panels.

3.title: Self-diagnostics (heater impedance, Î»-drift) streamed upstream; schedule service before the light comes on.

AgriNOx.title: AgriNOx â€“ Precision Nâ‚‚O Monitoring
AgriNOx.description: Ultra-sensitive, field-ready Nâ‚‚O monitoring that helps growers optimize nitrogen inputs, cut input costs, and document measurable sustainability gains. Now in active pilots with a multi-thousand-acre Central Valley grower.

1.title: Real-time in-situ Nâ‚‚O ppm â†’ kg N lost/ha algorithm.

2.title: Turns nitrogen savings into CARB LCFS or voluntary carbon credits.

3.title: Integrates with GPS-enabled spreaders
3.description: variable-rate prescriptions based on live soil plume.

4.title: Annual subscription (SaaS)
4.description: analytics, benchmarking, and automated credit registry filing.

workflowSection.title: Pilot Workflow
workflowSection.1: Install probe & LoRa gateway in < 10 min.
workflowSection.2: Farm leverages live Nâ‚‚O + weather to trim side-dress passes.
workflowSection.3: Verified credit statement auto-generated at harvest.

Technology.title: The Science behind RedNox Sensors
Technology.subTitle: Learn about the sophisticated engineering and robust design that allows our sensors to provide unprecedented sub-ppm insight and enduring performance across diverse applications

1.howItWorks: YSZ stack generates mixed potential proportional to NOx; precision built for sub-ppm response.
1.whyItMatters: Durable solid-state design resists contaminants and outlasts legacy cells.

2.howItWorks: Catalyst speeds NOx redox; heater hits 650 Â°C in seconds with low power.
2.whyItMatters: Captures cold-start spikes; runs efficiently from ECU power.

3.howItWorks: Embedded sensors and MCU apply real-time temp and gas corrections.
3.whyItMatters: Stays accurate across conditions without recalibration.

4.howItWorks: Calibrated to traceable NOx blends; data stored in memory and QR code.
4.whyItMatters: Enables full traceability and easier compliance reporting.

5.howItWorks: Dual-beam IR with interference cancellation and micro-pump sampling.
5.whyItMatters: Sub-ppb soil Nâ‚‚O detection in real time with low-power, solar-ready operation.

AboutRednox.title: About RedNOx
AboutRednox.headline: Reducing NOâ‚“, COâ‚‚ and Nâ‚‚O Emissions now
AboutRednox.subheader: RedNOx is a company that creates GHG emissions sensors. It combines advanced ceramic engineering with high-precision instrumentation to make selective and sensitive NOâ‚“, COâ‚‚ and Nâ‚‚O measurement platform. It has started several verification programs in collaboration with top automotive and agriculture companies.

whyRednox.title: Why RedNOx
whyRednox.headline: Breakthrough NOâ‚“ Technology
whyRednox.subheader: Our platform can measure NOâ‚“ and Nâ‚‚O greenhouse gases at the parts-per-billion level. Our goal is to provide sensor platforms to clean energy and alternative fuel engines around the world as quickly as possible. We are developing these sensors for use in various mobility areas. Our LoNOâ‚“â„¢ high-temperature ceramics and Nâ‚‚O technologies can potentially reduce emissions to levels set by the EPA and CARB, while also lowering costs for engine manufacturers and farmers.

solomon.bio: Born in Uganda and grew up in Kenya as a war refugee. He co-founded SpiroSure, which had a $100 million exit to a multinational respiratory company in 2020.

dutta.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He developed concepts for RedNOx technology in his lab at The Ohio State University.

markel.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He is a systems engineering expert with Makel Engineering.

solomon.bio: Born in Uganda and grew up in Kenya as a war refugee. He co-founded SpiroSure, which had a $100 million exit to a multinational respiratory company in 2020.

dutta.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He developed concepts for RedNOx technology in his lab at The Ohio State University.

markel.bio: A world expert in sensor technology. He is a systems engineering expert with Makel Engineering.

peter.bio: An experienced entrepreneur in the tech industry. He has over 25 years of experience architecting and building software systems and is an expert in customer-centric solutions

matt.bio: A founding team member of Farmers Business Network, which grew into a $4B company. He led the company's data science, new technology evaluation, and investment efforts

kurt.bio: Grew FBN's crop input business to $70M/yr revenue as GM. He co-founded Graphyte for carbon removal via biomass and is the COO at ProducePay, a fintech for produce farmers.

wayne.bio: Wayne is an experienced seed-stage investor with a track record of fueling startups with guidance and venture capital. He's been involved in over 200 investments, including sitting on over 50 boards and taking more than 60 businesses through exits. Throughout his career, he has maintained his passion and enthusiasm for helping entrepreneurs change the world.
